main.bio: Shy with somewhat a bubbly personality, very active in sports activities, adventurous outgoing at times very outspoken, however very much respectful, im comfortable working and learning new technologies, team work, project management and creativity, I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills, I use a creative approach to problem solve, I am also able to handle multiple tasks on a daily basis..
main.contactmessage: Im available on all most all social media, mainly Instagram, facebook and ocourse twitter.

Ive had the privelege of getting intoduced to several technologies epspecilly progrmming languages, my useful skills acquired i can say are ; communication skill, team-work , project leadership skills , problem solving using various resourses.

work.title: Marketing Manager/ junior (front-end designer)
work.description: As Marketing manager im resposible for the digital advertising and marketing of the company/website, managing changes that may occure and implenting them on the digital side of marketting. There are no special projects yet either than hosing competions that can promote the website more, notable achievements are bieng able to engage with people on social media to generate traffic on or website. I have grown our facebook page ; Auxigen Media and our instagram page @auxigen_media, and im curretly on working progress with courses on Udemy to learn new technologies and skils espeically on the front-end development as well as the business side of technology.
